meanings.definition: A protective helmet worn by construction workers.
meanings.sent1: The construction worker put on his hardhats before starting work.
meanings.sent2: Hardhats are essential for safety on a construction site.
meanings.sent3: The hardhats at the construction site had a party to celebrate a successful project.
meanings.sent4: The hardhats of the workers were like shields, protecting them from falling debris.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow hardhats stood out against the backdrop of the construction site.

meanings.definition: Workers who wear protective helmets on a construction site.
meanings.sent1: The hardhats gathered for a safety briefing before starting their shift.
meanings.sent2: The hardhats worked diligently to ensure the project was completed on time.
meanings.sent3: During lunch break, the hardhats shared funny stories from the construction site.
meanings.sent4: The hardhats were the unsung heroes of the construction industry, always ready to protect.
meanings.sent5: The team of hardhats moved in unison, a symbol of unity and safety.
